reviews.review_msg: I really enjoyed Yuthika's teaching, and the course was really interesting and not hard at all if you go to class. Highly recommend!

The midterm and final were tough, with answer concepts so similar and applicable it was hard to choose. She isn't accommodating and blames students for issues, even tech-related. Lecture slides aren't posted, and exams test tiny details she mentions in lecture. Avoid if possible.

Rebecca is great; she's very helpful and tries to give as much information and help, when asked a question. She likes to get to know students, even in 100 people lecture. The MC of exams are a bit harder, they're more application questions rather than memorizing theories or numbers. Definitely suggest taking a class with her.
